course.subject: MATH
course.name: Introduction to Molecular Modeling
course.description: This course will introduce fundamental principles of statistical physics and computer simulation methods at the molecular scale, including Monte Carlo methods and molecular dynamics.

reviews.author: Barreira
reviews.comment_content: TBD - My exchange-buddy said I should just fill in something so I get acces to the webpage since I'm an exchangestudent- so this is me doing that. I will change it after Ive done the course!
reviews.comment_teaching: TBD - Hopefully the teaching will be nice, I'm looking forward to seeing the difference between Sweden and Hong Kong!
reviews.comment_grading: TBD - Since everything will be translated to PASS when I get back to Sweden I'm probably not going to aim for high grades in any of the courses, unless I find them fun
reviews.comment_workload: TBD - So I'm hoping it will be a ddecent workload but you never know right? It feels so different from course to course.
